WDY_CTLR_COMPO_SOURCE_VRS.SOURCE_LINE: data lt_bds_content type table of bapiconten.
"Recupero nombre de logo de tabla de parámetros
"3. convert the binary contents into bitmap format.
"bitmap format is file format for digital images.
"so a conversion from bds to bmp is required. call the below fm
"now table lt_content contains the required data of image. but to
"link it with the image element, we need to convert the bitmap
"data into xstring format. below source code can be used for it.
"this custom logic is picked up from fm scms_binary_to_xstring
describe field ls_grline length lv_linelength in byte mode.
concatenate lv_file_x ls_grline-line into lv_file_x in byte mode.
concatenate lv_file_x ls_grline-line(lv_length) into lv_file_x in byte mode.
"5. generate a url which will be linked with image ui element.
"after step 4, we have image data (xstring) in lv_file_x parameter.
" now a url needs to be generated which image ui element will point to.
"6. set the above generated url in image ui element's source property.
"In step1, we have created a Context attribute named IMAGE_url
"which is linked to Image element's source property. in this
"step, we will set the value (url created in above step) in this attribute.
* data lo_api_controller type ref to if_wd_view_controller.
* data lo_action type ref to if_wd_action.
"Recupero texto standard (SO10) para footer cargado en tabla de parámetros
data lo_html_fragment type ref to cl_wd_html_fragment.
